Articles.Content:
So the new update has rendered all the previous lifters shared here obsolete. Have you guys come up with any new ones?

I'll share mine first- it's a rather simple lifter designed to get my mun lander and its transfer stage into orbit.

Yes, that is my flag in the background. Yes, that is a lion hawk.

Recently Completed

Soyuz 7K-OK (ca. 1967)

http://www./download/frvtd60231d6nke/Soviet_Soyuz_7K-OK.craft

It's a 1 man orbiter in this iteration,

If you press 1 you will open the solar panels, and Abort fires the launch escape system

For the greatest efficiency check the staging, some stages just jettison fairings and firing them won't set off any rockets accidentally, since fairings don't do anything yet I'd get rid of them early
I made a Proton. Although I'll have to dig through my abundant amount of crafts (many of which don't work).

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Here's my Proton. Craft: http://d.pr/f/mwKc

Not to rain on your parade, but the much feared 0.21 has hardly touched a thing for me. My lifters are just as stable if not more, my SSTO's can still get to orbit (some babysitting required)... hell, it even converted my savefile without issues, and the first module of my KSS Alpha was put there on 0.17. All I lost was the stuff with mods, particularly kethane, and only because of the part renaming, if not I have a hunch everything would have worked out perfectly.

Rune. Now I have a BIG astronaut rooster, and I haven't hired anyone.

I had no issues either, apart from mods; havent really got any lifters as i like to send up huge ships in one go; so i make my ship and then slap on a ton of mainsails and fuel tanks and off i go! Its not the best way to do it but it works.

I am still using the same lifters I made in 0.18. I did build them with Ferram aerospace installed though. They are rock solid in stock KSP.

Only general purpose lifter I have built in 0.21. A little bit impractical at 837 parts, but it was just something I had to try.
